properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Whatsoever you do
to the least of my brothers,
that you do unto me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I was hungry,
you gave me to eat;
When I was thirsty,
you gave me to drink.
Now enter into the home
of my Father.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I was homeless,
you opened your door;
When I was naked,
you gave me your coat.
Now enter into the home
of my Father.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I was weary,
you helped me find rest;
When I was anxious,
you calmed all my fears.
Now enter into the home
of my Father.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When in a prison,
you came to my cell;
When on a sickbed,
you cared for my needs.
Now enter into the home
of my Father.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
When I was aged
you bothered to smile;
When I was restless
you listened and cared,
Now enter int o the home
of my Father.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
When I was laughed at,
you stood by my side;
When I was happy,
you shared in my joy.
Now enter into the home
of my Father.
